pkgmetadata.longdescription: Interface to the 'Biodiversity' 'Heritage' Library // Interface to 'Biodiversity' 'Heritage' Library ('BHL') (https://www.biodiversitylibrary.org/) API (https://www.biodiversitylibrary.org/docs/api3.html). 'BHL' is a repository of 'digitized' literature on 'biodiversity' studies, including 'floras', research papers, and more.
